title: Winter freeze strains pipes, water infrastructure in US South
description: US city of Jackson, Mississippi, is once again under a boil-water advisory after months of unsafe drinking water.

title: Peru arrests three police generals amid Castillo corruption probe
description: Authorities say generals took part in pay-for-promotion scheme with alleged approval of ex-President Pedro Castillo.

title: US’s New Jersey may limit TikTok to separate devices, emails show
description: Democratic-governed state is considering joining Republican-led efforts to limit Chinese app, records request shows.

title: Brazil to boost security for Lula inauguration after bomb threat
description: Incoming minister says Brazil cannot allow 'political terrorism' after Bolsonaro supporter accused of bomb plot.

title: Photos: The year in Ukraine, month by month
description: As the year end approaches, we look back on the events and images that marked Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Argentina’s president to abide by Supreme Court ruling on funding
description: Alberto Fernandez calls decision to award more funding to Buenos Aires 'unfair' but reverses stance from last week.

title: China to end COVID quarantine for incoming passengers
description: Decision a major step towards easing entry restrictions, which have largely closed China's borders since early 2020.

title: Is a negotiated settlement possible in Russia’s war in Ukraine?
description: Vladimir Putin accuses his opponent of avoiding talks but Volodymyr Zelenskyy says it's just a delaying tactic.

title: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy seeks India’s help with ‘peace formula’
description: Phone call between Ukraine president and Narendra Modi comes as India is seeking to strengthen trade ties with Russia.

title: Turkey summons French ambassador after Paris shooting
description: Ankara expressed unease at PKK flags spotted during a march mourning the shooting deaths of three Kurds in Paris

title: This festive season, many displaced women are struggling
description: With inadequate aid, women-headed households will find it hard to keep their children fed and warm.

title: Following gang truce, Colombia city becomes experiment in peace
description: In the city of Buenaventura, a ceasefire between two rival gangs is being held up as a model for government peace plans.

title: What is behind a resurgence of violent attacks in Pakistan?
description: Analysts say the government must assert its dominance and immediately devise a strategy to counter escalating attacks.

title: US winter storm death toll rises as thousands still without power
description: 'This is not the end yet,' official in hard-hit area of western New York where huge blizzard killed at least 25 people.

title: Attacks in Syria’s Raqqa kill several Kurdish security officers
description: Officials say an ISIL cell had targeted security and military buildings in the city, killing six fighters.

title: Hezbollah ‘supporter’ detained in probe of UN peacekeeper killing
description: A Hezbollah spokesperson says the detained suspect is a supporter of the group but not a member.

title: France places Paris shooting suspect under formal probe
description: The 69-year-old suspected of shooting dead three Kurdish people in Paris appears before an investigating judge.

title: Six major developments that shaped 2022 for Palestinians
description: The UN called 2022 the deadliest year for Palestinians in the Israeli-occupied West Bank in 16 years.

title: Inside the library where you can read in two countries at once
description: The US-Canada border cuts through the Haskell Free Library and Opera House, built more than 100 years ago.

title: UN to Taliban: ‘Vital’ to reverse ban on women in NGOs
description: The Taliban's decision to ban women from working at NGOs has seen many organisations suspend aid work in Afghanistan.

title: Early voter registration in DRC marred by kit shortages
description: The elections are scheduled for December 2023, despite spiralling insecurity in the east, spearheaded by the M23 rebels

title: Serbia’s Pirot city declares emergency after ammonia leak
description: At least 15 people are being treated in hospital after an ammonia leak caused by a cargo train derailment.

title: ‘Weak and sick’: Rohingya reach Indonesia after weeks at sea
description: Dozens of hungry and weak Rohingya landed on a beach in Indonesia's northernmost province of Aceh.

title: Ethiopian federal government delegation heads to troubled Tigray
description: The federal government and Tigrayan forces signed an agreement to permanently cease hostilities after two years of fight

title: UN says 2022 among deadliest years for Rohingya at sea
description: A boat carrying 180 Rohingya is missing at sea and presumed sunk, a UN agency says.

title: Ronaldo dropped because of ‘political ban’ says Erdogan
description: Turkish leader says the Portuguese footballer is 'someone who stands for the Palestinian cause'.

title: An unexpected friendship: A lighthouse across the years
description: Writer Kao Kalia Yang reflects on her friendship with an older couple who has guided her life - and her career.

title: Migrants dropped off at US VP Harris’s home over Christmas
description: Aid groups say more than 100 migrants and refugees, who are seeking asylum in the US, were transported from Texas.

title: South Korea fires warning shots as North’s drones enter airspace
description: Breaking: South Korea has reportedly fired warning shots after North Korea violated its airspace by sending in drones.

title: Ukrainian drone wreckage kills three Russians at military base
description: Defence ministry says the incident happened at a military base in Sorotov region, 730km southeast of Moscow.

title: As the war in Ukraine rages, Eastern Europe is growing stronger
description: The balance of power in the European Union is shifting eastwards.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 306
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 306th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: News Quiz 2022
description: Follow the news? Take our quiz and see if you can recognise some of the biggest stories of 2022.

title: Survey: How would you rate our coverage in 2022?
description: What stories captured your attention in 2022? Take our two-minute survey.

title: Belarus says Russian Iskander missile systems ready for use
description: Deployment of weapons comes amid Moscow's increasing pressure on Minsk to aid its invasion of Ukraine.

title: China ‘sends record number of fighter jets’ toward Taiwan
description: China sends 71 planes and seven ships towards Taiwan in display of force over US defence support for self-ruled island.

title: China’s workers return to office as cities live with COVID
description: Commuters in Beijing and Shanghai are crowding roads and public transport as cities move past tough 'zero-COVID' policy.

title: Two missing after avalanche hits skiers in Austria
description: Ten people were initially feared buried, but rescue workers say eight have since been identified and accounted for.
